answers.answer: It sounds like your sugar, try drinking some more oj or apple juice and eatting some peanuts or crackers with peanutbutter. If you are dehydrated, your urine will be dark colored.

I had that issue before I got pregnant and the dr told me my potassium levels were low. Then informed me I would have to eat a ton of bananas to get it back up. That may not be the case for you but I do know if you eat a banana then happen to throw up it tastes no different (tmi i know sorry) but there is also free nurse lines you can call and they will tell you if you should go to the er. I wish you the best and pray nothing is wrong
Andyour sugar can drop wether you have diabetes or not, just try to keep some munchie food with you and if what I mentioned above helps, you may want to let your ob know at your next appointment.

question: I'm 10 weeks and 3 day pregnant I was at work and all of a sudden I got very dizzy and from my left eye all I can see on my computer screen was blurry ness I chewed on a piece of gum and had a cup of orange juice but still feel like **** and also spitting alot like I'm goin to vomit no matter how much water I try to drink I still feel dehydrated please help I'm a ftm should I go to ER ? Could I have diabetes ?  Can I be dehydrated and need sum iv? How do I know my baby is ok ? Please help I'm very worried
title: HELP.! SICK .!
